website_summaries.verdict: An uptown upgrade for any doll, designed with swivel wheels for easy navigating.
pros: Will be an instant crowd-pleaser at your little girl's birthday, with a show-stopping design and function
Parents appreciate the stroller's sturdiness as well as its ability to last despite a child's attention span
Ideal for kids up to about 5 years old
cons: Requires some assembly that is not clear to all customers

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have a special needs daughter and we are using this to teach her to transport her AAC device around and for pretraining for a potential blind cane in the future. We put her baby and AAC device in the stroller and she did great! It was easy for her to maneuver and should last for a bit more (she’s currently 40” tall and there is room to still out the handle higher)!
customer_reviews.author: L. Hickey

customer_reviews.title: Niece LOVES THIS
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old niece got this carriage and absolutely loves it. It was easy to assemble, it is durable. She carries a bazillion dolls, stuffed animals, even a mini dachshund for a little stint in the house (It is NOT designed to hold a lot of weight.. I would say 10lbs maximum, fyi). The little boys will play with it too. It has been run and rammed and still seems to be in very good shape. It does well on sidewalks outside. This gift was a hit. I would recommend it if looking for a toy carriage!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this stroller!!
customer_reviews.text: ADORABLE!! I love this stroller. So cute and well made. The size is great. Easy to assemble. Love the colors on it too. Got it for a 5 year old. She will love it! Spent a little more on this one Bc it looked more functional. And I’m so glad I did. Worth it! Buy this!!
customer_reviews.author: M1234

customer_reviews.title: Love this stroller!
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this stroller for its adjustable handle, so my little girl could comfortably use it for several years. It was super easy to put together, and the handle adjusts easily. Its not only cute, it has great quality fabric, wheels, and frame. There is plenty of room for 2 babies, stuffed animals, etc. Best of all, it smoothly and effortlessly moves in any direction and pivots like a dream. Wish I had a real size stroller that moved that easily! The only hesitation I would have for purchasing is if your child is still learning to walk, this stroller might move to quickly for them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 4-year-old niece loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I shipped this to my niece for her 4th birthday. She immediately opened it, put all of her stuffed animals in it, and started running around with it. Win win win Pros: Easy to assemble Looks like a real stroller Makes 4-year-old niece very happy Adjustable push handle will allow her to grow with it. Comes in niece's favorite color: purple Cons: None I'll write an update if any issues crop up.
customer_reviews.author: Edith

customer_reviews.title: My five-year-old loves this.
customer_reviews.text: My five-year-old loves it. Pretty easy to put together you just need to tap in the ends for the wheels but a small hammer can do the trick. Folding it up is pretty simple as well and is able to withstand walks around the block. I’ll together a pretty good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Already broken
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it but the handle padding is already cracking and peeling. She has only had it for one week. Cheaper made than I expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gena

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable! Works exactly like real stroller would. Easy to assemble. Our 5 year old daughter adore it! Perfect size for 17 inch baby, but can fit even bigger baby (as my daughter stuffed lol it with baby which is size of 6 month old baby) lol
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Functions well
customer_reviews.text: Second doll stroller I've tried for my daughter and construction is great. Highly recommend this item
customer_reviews.author: Addie

customer_reviews.title: what little girls like !!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this carriage/stroller for my granddaughter for Christmas. She went crazy over it. I came in several colors, however her favorite color is pink and purple. This was her favorite gift this year....
customer_reviews.author: barbara deering

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for girls up to 6 (8 at the most)
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. Everything just snaps in place. I was expecting a more sturdier frame for the price. That is why I didn't give 5 stars. Very light weight perfect for a little girl. Bought it for a 5 yr old she loves it!! Otherwise very cute stroller. Versatile. *will not hold anything heavy. No pets! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: My little girl loved it. I was nervous about spending this much money on a toy pram but it is sturdy and really cute! I love that it can be a stroller or pram. My daughter is 3 and is sometimes rough with it but it has held up for almost a year so far.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice stroller. My daughter loves this and she takes it everywhere. Has even been on vacation with us. Great construction and does not feel like a toy. Very smooth operation and am very impressed with the quality. I recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t look cheap Pierier and if you order online you know what I mean.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my granddaughter and was very pleased that turned out to be what I was hoping to expect. It’s durable and well-made product. 5 stars ⭐️ for this item!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Sarli

customer_reviews.title: ADORABLE
customer_reviews.text: So adorable, my granddaughter loves it!! So many people have stopped us while out wanting to know where we got the stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Momma J

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken ×2
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived broken. This is the 2nd one. Due to unable to get to ups to return, I have lost out on my refund. Should give longer time frame to return or have ups pick up available.
customer_reviews.author: julie b

customer_reviews.title: Like a real stroller!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is great !! Folds up for putting away or travel and easy to maneuver ! My daughter just loads it up with dolls and carts it everywhere !
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: fits 21 inch doll and is sturdy ..great quality
customer_reviews.text: this stroller fits a 21 inch doll and I lived this stroller for my 3 and half year old girl. the wheels are so smooth to push and it is durable material. Great purchase! came nice boxed up...just as picture shown u will not be unhappy
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Casarez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Stroller!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome stroller for me 3 and 6 year olds! They love it! It’s easy to push (better than some real strollers) and easy to put together. It’s very well made and doesn’t feel cheap at all!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my niece several months back. I am happy to report that it is still one of her favorite toys (and they have MANY!). It was very easy to setup out of the box
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable handle for taller kids
customer_reviews.text: My tall 4 year granddaughter loves it as does her little sister. The adjustable handle is a great feature!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Hachmeister

customer_reviews.title: Really great quality. It should last her a really long ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave this stroller to my daughter as a gift. She loves it! Really great quality. It should last her a really long time!

customer_reviews.title: Easy to push and great height for her
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is really enjoying this stroller. Easy to push and great height for her. Well made.

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Seems really sturdy, was assembled in minutes. She (2 1/2 yrs.) immediately loaded it with her dolls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was a bit confusing to put together but I figured ...
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit confusing to put together but I figured it out! My 3 year old absolutely loves it!

customer_reviews.title: I Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is the Best Stroller that we have bought for our daughters! All of the other doll strollers break too easily.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for my granddaughter!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I bought this as a 6th birthday present for our granddaughter...she loved it!

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this stroller. I bought two for my girls, ages 2 and 4 and it perfect for both.

customer_reviews.title: Just like the real deal!
customer_reviews.text: It looks like the real deal! My niece loved it!

customer_reviews.text: This Stoller is just like the real thing! It's amazing! Santa sure bought a good present!

customer_reviews.title: Love the pram stroller
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old granddaughter loved this pram Stroller. It was easy to assemble and quite sturdy. It was perfect heighth for her size. I would recommend this stroller

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my great granddaughter, 2-1/2 years old. She loves it! Easy to put together in about 5 minutes. Quality is excellent. A great gift!

customer_reviews.title: Great all around product!
customer_reviews.text: Got this stroller for my granddaughters 2nd birthday. She absolutely loves it. The adjustable handles will provide play for many years. Great stroller all around.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: The size of the stroller was perfect for my two year old granddaughter and it was very easy for her to maneuver. The purple and pink colors are attractive and the many extra parts are worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved this stroller! She is almost 6 and loves to play “the mom” it has several different ways to adjust the handle and how their baby dolls sit in it. Very user friendly for a child. 2 thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Nana spoils her grandbabies

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & worth the price
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter Loves the stroller It’s easy to maneuver & the handle adjustment for her height is wonderful This will grow with her

customer_reviews.text: This is very cute and seems to be fairly well made. However it is a lot shorter than we expected. If your child is tall or over the age of five I wouldn't buy it.

product_meta.title: Mommy & Me Babyboo Deluxe Doll Stroller Foldable Doll Pram with Swiveling Wheels, Adjustable Handle, Convertible Seat, Basket, and Free Carriage Bag, Pink and Purple - 9651B
product_meta.description: Truly a deluxe pram, it is multi function, adjust the handle high and low, front or back, zipper the pram on or off, make the seat flat or in a angle, just to name a few. Your princess will turn heads as she scrolls down the Blvd with this master piece, and the quality is great and 100% safety tested for American Safety standards.
feature_bullets: Doll Stroller Measures H 27.5" x W 13" x L 27", handle can be adjusted to 17" high, and turned so doll can face Mom or the street.
Basket and carriage bag made to hold all your doll accessories, hood opens and closes.
Easily fits up to 18 inch dolls. Super easy to assemble! Folds for on the go travel.
An ideal gift for all doll lovers and pretend Moms.
Made of top quality materials and safety tested for lead free.
